recipesJson.name: Loco Unicorn - Jenn W
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description:
WS23 Optional 0.25% 
This is really good mix and even has a lot of the authentic taste from the original cocktail. WS23 isnâ€™t for everyone but it really brings this vape to the next level of authenticity 

Please see below for cocktail recipe. 
6oz coconut water
2oz Capt Morgan Loco Nut
1/4oz Grenadine 
1/4oz Blue Curacao liqueur

reviews.text: I'm tempted to ding this one for not tasting exactly like the picture on several fronts - the orange is more like a real orange or tangerine than Blue Curacao liqueur, there's a bunch of vanilla that doesn't belong, etc - but I can't because it was so, so good. My 50ml is gone and I'm sad and might have to mix up some more.  Orange-vanilla-coconut is a an amazing trio of flavors that I'd definitely like to explore some more, so this recipe is an inspiration.  It's smooth, it's a little rich, and it's just so flavorsome. Good to the last drop.
